instruction: Compare a given decision between two individuals.
input: Individuals: May and Tom | Decision: whether or not to take an unpaid internship
output: May and Tom have differing views on whether or not to take an unpaid internship. May believes that taking the internship is an opportunity to gain valuable experience and bolster her resume. However, Tom believes that an unpaid internship is not worth the effort and that it is better to look for a paying job.
